author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of February 8, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins Twenty-one disclosures since last week, with eight issues unfixed. View this week's vulnerable plugins list.
